00019 #ifndef REPORTS_EDITOR_H
00020 #define REPORTS_EDITOR_H

00025 #include <qwidget.h>
00026 
00027 class QString;
00028 class QIODevice;
00029 
00030 class ReportsEditor : public QObject
00031 {
00032     Q_OBJECT
00033     public:
00034         struct Entity {
00035             Q_UINT8 editor;
00036             Q_UINT8 section;
00037             Q_UINT16 index;
00038             QString accountBegin;
00039             QString accountEnd;
00040             QString desc;
00041         };
00042 
00044         enum Editor { BalanceSheet, IncomeSvc, IncomeRetail };
00045 
00047         enum Section { Assets, Liabilities, Equities,
00048                 Income, CostOfSales, Expenses };
00049 
00050         static ReportsEditor* instance();
00051 
00052         void destroy();
00053         
00054         void initiate();

00057

00059

00063

00065

00067 
00068         bool entityExists(Editor editor, Section section,
00069                         QString accountBegin, QString accountEnd, QString desc);
00070 
00071         Q_UINT16 getFirstIndex(Editor editor, Section section);
00072 
00073         Q_UINT16 getLastIndex(Editor editor, Section section);
00074 
00075         Q_UINT16 getNextIndex(Editor editor, Section section);
00076

00078         void moveEntityDown(Entity *entity);

00080         void removeEntity(Entity *entity);
